description.effect.minecraft.instant_hea: Heals living entities and damages undead.
description.effect.minecraft.instant_dam: Damages living entities and heals undead.
description.effect.minecraft.jump_boost: Increases jump height and reduces fall damage.
description.effect.minecraft.fire_resist: Grants immunity to fire and lava.
description.effect.minecraft.water_breat: Grants the ability to breathe underwater.
description.effect.minecraft.blindness: Reduces viewing range and prevents the player from sprinting and dealing critical hits.
description.effect.minecraft.night_visio: Allows to see in the dark.
description.effect.minecraft.poison: Deals damage over time. Does not affect undead.
description.effect.minecraft.glowing: Outlines entities, making them visible through blocks.
description.effect.minecraft.luck: Can increase the quality and quantity of loot.
description.effect.minecraft.unluck: Can decrease the quality and quantity of loot.
description.effect.minecraft.slow_fallin: Reduces falling speed and negates fall damage.
description.effect.botania.soul_cross: Restores health upon slaying any other creature.
description.effect.botania.emptiness: Prevents mob spawning in a 128 block radius.
description.effect.botania.bloodthirst: Allows mobs to spawn regardless of normal conditions within 64 blocks.
description.effect.botania.allure: Doubles the speed of catching fish and fishing loot.
description.effect.botania.clear: Clears all potion effects, both positive and negative.
description.effect.potionsmaster.coalpot: Highlights coal ore around the drinker.

description.effect.potionsmaster.allthem: Highlights allthemodium ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.uranium: Highlights uranium ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.leadpot: Highlights lead ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.silverp: Highlights silver ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.osmiump: Highlights osmium ore around the drinker.

description.effect.potionsmaster.quartzp: Highlights quartz ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.bismuth: Highlights bismuth ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.crimson: Highlights crimson iron ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.platinu: Highlights platinum ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.village: Teleports the drinker to the nearest village.
description.effect.potionsmaster.shipwre: Teleports the drinker to the nearest shipwreck.
description.effect.potionsmaster.ocean_r: Teleports the drinker to the nearest ocean ruins.
description.effect.potionsmaster.buried_: Teleports the drinker to the nearest buried treasure.
description.effect.potionsmaster.endcity: Teleports the drinker to the nearest end city.
description.effect.potionsmaster.fortres: Teleports the drinker to the nearest nether fortress.
description.effect.potionsmaster.monumen: Teleports the drinker to the nearest ocean monument.
description.effect.potionsmaster.strongh: Teleports the drinker to the nearest stronghold.
description.effect.potionsmaster.swamp_h: Teleports the drinker to the nearest witch hut.
description.effect.potionsmaster.jungle_: Teleports the drinker to the nearest jungle temple.
description.effect.potionsmaster.desert_: Teleports the drinker to the nearest desert pyramid.
description.effect.potionsmaster.igloopo: Teleports the drinker to the nearest igloo.
description.effect.potionsmaster.mansion: Teleports the drinker to the nearest woodland mansion.
description.effect.potionsmaster.minesha: Teleports the drinker to the nearest mineshaft.
description.effect.potionsmaster.pillage: Teleports the drinker to the nearest pillager outpost.
description.effect.xreliquary.cure: Cures zombie villagers. Higher levers work faster.
